problem_statement: The core challenge lies in managing Mutable Time and State Contention. The
requirement creates a dynamic end-time, causing naive server timers to trigger prematurely during extensions. Simultaneously,

occur when concurrent users submit identical bids; without explicit database transactions or mutexes, the auction state becomes corrupted. Furthermore, the system must mitigate Clock Skew by propagating absolute timestamps, ensuring network latency does not desynchronize the client-side countdowns.
